# init(track:)

**Initializer**

Creates a mutable input parameters object for a given track.

## Declaration

```swift
convenience init(track: AVAssetTrack?)
```

## Parameters

- **track**: The track to associate with the input parameters object.

## Return Value

A mutable input parameters object with no volume ramps and [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMutableAudioMixInputParameters/trackID] set to `track`’s identifier.
